data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Bruxelles, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bruxelles, Belgium
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 27,334 believers in Bruxelles.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 66 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,802,667 lost in Bruxelles that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Bruxelles who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, 0.3% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Bruxelles that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Bruxelles.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bruxelles, Belgium has a population of 1,830,000.

We estimate Bruxelles has 27,334 people who might know Jesus, 1,150,838 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 651,829 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 66 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Bruxelles. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
